name: Jingle Ball
description:
You control a ping pong ball, trying to bounce from bumper to bumper trying to get to the top of the machine, as you try to avoid falling back down. 

Controls

A: Move Left

D: Move Right

Programmers:

  • Jack Murray
  • Edgar Gunther

Artists:

  • Adeline Nicholson
  • Andrei Hadley
  • Jaden Posada
  • Josiah Hummel

Game Designer:

  • Ryan Diztler
